text: An election happened on November 3, 2020 to elect a Senator from the U.S. state of Colorado. The main two people in the election were Cory Gardner (Republican Party) and John Hickenlooper (Democratic Party). Hickenlooper won the election and became Senator. Gardner was Senator before the election.https://www.usnews.com/news/elections/articles/2020-11-03/democrat- john-hickenlooper-defeats-cory-gardner-for-colorado-senate-seat Primary elections happened on June 30, 2020. In the Republican Party primary, nobody went against Cory Gardner. There were two people in the Democratic Party primary election: John Hickenlooper and Andrew Romanoff. Hickenlooper won this primary. There was also a primary for the Libertarian Party between Raymon Doane and Gaylon Kent. Doane won this primary. ==Democratic Party primary== ==Republican Party primary== ==Libertarian Party primary== ==Results== ==References== Category:2020 United States Senate elections Category:Colorado elections Category:2020s in Colorado
title: 2020 United States Senate election in Colorado
